## IdentifyFunction

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/flags/feature-flags.ts" sourceLine="39" packageName="commandkit" />

Function type for identifying entities in the context of feature flags.
This function should return an object representing the entity that will be used
to evaluate the feature flag.
It can be synchronous or asynchronous.

```ts title="Signature"
type IdentifyFunction<R> = (
  context: EvaluationContext,
) => MaybePromise<R>
```
